title: What comes to your mind when you hear the word 'life'? - Quora

response.answer_text: To me always …life is a journey in which we started it from the birth..it gives a variety of places which is meant is a experience … We have to gain experience rather a complaining it… In this journey …the most important thing is …we have to DRIVE …not hiring others ….were you will end up in the wrong way… By driving in your own way …..you will fail …you will face many good things many bad things ….but its You who learn it …how not to …how you can do it!!! Each zone gives you great experience, get it as a candy …and learn from it…we cant say how many km we will be allowed to travel…but …one thing is damn sure…we can grasp great things in a beautiful way… Most of them feel bad about their life…by watching others life…everyone is facing bad experience.. everyone has gone through their hardships…but the only thing is to SURVIVE…in a oustanding way…THOSE WHO DONT HAVE THE ABILITY TO LIVE THEIR LIFE WHICH GOD HAS GIVEN WILL FEEL ENVIOUS ABOUT OTHERS LIFE.
Can be summed up by an extract from the poem of H.W. Longfellow: “Life is real! Life is earnest! And the grave is not its goal; Dust thou art, to dust returnest, Was not spoken of the soul. “
